note: Tiago Hori is the name. Speak in unspeakable complicated ways is the job. Adopted islander, I call PEI home. Learning to love the bomb. Adieu, ami lecteur; songez à ne pas passer votre vie à haïr et à avoir peur. Stendhal - Lucien Lewen Genomics scientist turned director of innovation. Curious about your thoughts of how many species of blue mussels exist. Metal head, comic book nerd, owner of a chainsaw. The right kind of Doctor. Wanna be poet.
